mapper.select: SELECT rollingpick.*, productpics.`ppicurl`, product.*, productsize.pssellprice, productsize.`psoriprice` FROM rollingpick LEFT JOIN product ON rollingpick.`pid` = product.`pid` LEFT JOIN productpics ON rollingpick.`pid` = productpics.`pid` LEFT JOIN productsize ON rollingpick.`pid` = productsize.`pid` LEFT JOIN productdetail ON product.pid = productdetail.pid WHERE rollingpick.`is_deleted` = 0 AND productpics.`is_deleted` = 0 AND productpics.`is_headpic` = 1 AND product.`is_delete` = 0 AND productdetail.is_deleted = 0 AND productsize.`is_deleted` = 0 AND productsize.pssellprice = (SELECT MIN(productsize.pssellprice) FROM productsize WHERE rollingpick.`pid` = productsize.`pid`) AND rollingpick.`pid` = #{pid}
